body.p: Hadoop tracks both bugs and enhancement requests using JIRA.
We welcome input, however, before filing a request, please make sure you do the following:

ul.li: Check the users mailing lists, both by searching the archives and by asking questions.

section.title: Common
section.p: Hadoop Common issues are tracked in the HADOOP Jira instance.
